++ Remote

Remote refers to [Tasks] and [Technologies] that take place or are relevant to an external system.

    * [Sharer]
    * [Outsourcing]
    * NetworkAdministration
    * DistributedProcessing

When [Save] remote resources, [Paths] to the local copy are likely to appear underneath the remote path to indicate that it was saved. 
    when saving a webpage, the local representation path appears underneath remote URL
